attributes.action: Ban England Fans Leaving Early At Matches at Wembley.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I sit here in disbelief as people walk out of a match against Israel that we won 3-0. I demand that we ban so called 'fans' leaving football club matches early if not for a very good reason.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
